meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>instant</kanji> <kanji>day</kanji> is the day that's going on this instant. It's the <vocabulary>same day</vocabulary> as now.
readingMnemonic: The reading for 即 is the normal one. For 日 you're going to want to use the じつ reading, because, the <reading>truth</reading> (じつ) is that it's the same day today.
